title: 87/553/EEC: Commission Decision of 23 November 1987 suspending the illicit commercial practices procedure concerning the unauthorized reproduction of sound recordings in Indonesia
header:
COMMISSION
COMMISSION DECISION
of 23 November 1987
suspending the illicit commercial practices procedure concerning the unauthorized reproduction of sound recordings in Indonesia
(87/553/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The examination procedure concerning the unauthorized reproduction of sound recordings in Indonesia is hereby suspended until 29 February 1988.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 November 1987.
For the Commission
Willy DE CLERCQ
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 252, 20. 9. 1984, p. 1.
(2) OJ No C 136, 21. 5. 1987, p. 3.
